SEARCH
Package game.mills

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.mills.Game
public class Game extends Object
The NewGame class manages the game logic for Mills. It controls the game phases, player turns, moves, and interactions with the game board.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    Game(Player p1, Player p2)
    Constructs a new game instance with two players.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Player p1, Player p2)
      Constructs a new game instance with two players. Initializes the board and sets up the game for the placing phase.
      Parameters:
      p1 - the first player.
      p2 - the second player.

  • Method Details

    • switchPlayer

      public void switchPlayer()
      Switches the player when the turn changes.

    • placePiece

      public void placePiece(int nodeID)
      Places a piece on the board at the specified node ID. Validates the move and checks if a mill has been formed.
      Parameters:
      nodeID - the node ID where the piece is to be placed.
      Throws:
      InvalidMove - if the move is not valid.

    • updatePhase

      public void updatePhase()
      Updates the current game phase

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(int fromID, int toID)
      Executes a move from one node to another. Validates the move and checks if a mill is formed after the move.
      Parameters:
      fromID - the node ID where the piece is moved from.
      toID - the node ID where the piece is moved to.
      Throws:
      InvalidMove - if the move is not valid or flying is not allowed.

    • removeOpponentStone

      public void removeOpponentStone(int nodeID)
      Removes an opponent's stone from the board, if permitted.
      Parameters:
      nodeID - the node ID where the opponent's stone is located.
      Throws:
      InvalidMove - if the removal is not allowed.

    • isPlacingPhase

      public boolean isPlacingPhase()
      Checks if the game is currently in the placing phase.
      Returns:
      true if the game is in the placing phase, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the current player whose turn it is.
      Returns:
      the current player.

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Gets the game board.
      Returns:
      the board object representing the game board.

    • canFly

      public boolean canFly(Player currentPlayer)
      Checks if the current player is allowed to "fly" (move a piece to any open space on the board). A player can fly if they have exactly 3 stones on the board.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the player whose ability to fly is being checked.
      Returns:
      true if the player can fly, false otherwise.

    • getPhase

      public int getPhase()
      Gets the current game phase.
      Returns:
      the current phase of the game.

    • isMillFormed

      public boolean isMillFormed()
      Checks if a mill has been formed by the current player.
      Returns:
      true if a mill has been formed, false otherwise.

    • setMillFormed

      public void setMillFormed(boolean millFormed)
      Sets the mill formed status.
      Parameters:
      millFormed - true if a mill has been formed, false otherwise.

    • setUI

      public void setUI(MillGameUI ui)
      Sets the UI reference for the game to interact with.
      Parameters:
      ui - the MillGameUI object to be used for updating the game status and UI.
